name: obsidian-parser
description: Full-stack web application for document parsing with React TypeScript frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --prefix "[SERVER],[ CLIENT]" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
